mapper.select: select pms_task.*, pms_routine_status.routine_status_name as status_text,pms_routine_status.color as status_color from pms_task left join pms_routine_status on pms_task.status = pms_routine_status.id where pms_task.deleted_at is null and pms_routine_status.deleted_at is null and pms_task.type=#{type} and pms_task.module_id=#{module_id}
